name: FocusKeeper
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: focus keeper
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Focus Keeper helps you maximize productivity using timed work sessions and breaks.

• Start a standard session with four 25-minute focused work periods
• Each work period is followed by a short 5-minute break
• This proven technique helps maintain concentration and prevent burnout
• Use Alexa to effortlessly track your sessions without watching the clock

Great for
• Studying and exam preparation
• Work papers or reports 
• Tackling work projects
• Deep reading or research
• Creative tasks like writing or coding
• Household chores and decluttering
• Workouts and exercise
• And more!

FOCUS KEEPER PLUS
• Customize session lengths to fit your personal workflow
• Tailor break durations to your preferences

Focus Keeper is based on principles similar to the popular Pomodoro Technique, a time management method used by millions worldwide.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
